document_data.name: ''Wyrmsheart''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wyrmsheart''''' was an [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[longsword]] that belonged to the [[moon elf]] [[warrior]] [[Reluraun]].
document_data.Powers: This weapon had a ''+2 enchantment'' and a [[bane (property)|bane]] [[weapon quality|quality]] geared towards [[dragon]]s.
document_data.History: After Reluraun was buried within [[Reluraun's Tomb|his tomb]], ''Wyrmsheart'' was placed inside in the hands of an extremely lifelike effigy of the warrior.
